rukus.text: Shizhe chuzheng hou, zai houfang de ren yin neng anzuo jiazhong er gaoxing. Tamen bu yuan yi ziji de caichan he shengming wei zhu dao er fendou. Tamen huxiang zhufu shuo:“Nimen buyao zai retian chuzheng.” Ni shuo:“Huo yu de huo shi geng chire de, jiaruo tamen shi mingli de.”
Rang tamen shao xiao xie, duo ku xie, yi baochou tamen de ying mou

Ruguo an la shi ni zhuan huiqu jian dao tamen zhong de yi huo ren, er tamen yaoqiu ni yunxu tamen chuzheng, ni jiu dui tamen shuo:“Nimen yongyuan buyao tong wo yidao chuzheng, nimen jue buyao tong women yidao qu zuozhan; nimen chuci que yi xihuan anzuo jiazhong, wang hou, nimen jiu tong liu zai houfang de renmen yiqi anzuo jiazhong ba!”
Ni yongyuan buyao ti tamen zhong yi si de renhe ren juxing bin li, ni buyao qinlin tamen de fenmu, tamen que yi buxin an la ji qi shizhe, tamen shi beini de siqu de
Tamen de caichan he zisi buyao shi ni zantan, an la zhi yuan jie ci zai jinshi chengzhi tamen, tamen jiang zai buxindao de qingkuang xia siqu

Ruguo jiang shi yi zhang jing shuo:“Nimen yao xinyang an la, yao tong shizhe yiqi fendou,” tamen zhong de fuyu zhe jiu yao xiang ni qingjia, tamen shuo:“Ni rang women yu anzuo jiazhong de ren zai yiqi ba!”
Tamen ziyuan he funumen zai yiqi, tamen de xin yi fengbile, gu tamen bushi mingli de
Dan shizhe he ta de xinshimen, jie ziji de caichan he shengming er kangzhan; zhe deng ren zheng shi youfu de, zhe deng ren zheng shi chenggong de
An la yi wei tamen yubeile xia lin zhu he de leyuan, tamen jiang yong ju qizhong, na zheng shi weida de chenggong
